name: Armadillo Escape
description:
-headphones strongly recommended-

Armadillo Escape

You are an armadillo, fleeing the impending doom of the eruption of Mount Saint Helens, make it out!

Controls

If you missed some of the controls, here they are:

Desktop : 

  • Left Click - Launch
  • Right Click - Slowdown
  • Middle Click - Restart

Laptop:

  • Left Click - Launch
  • E - Slowdown
  • R - Restart

All controls apply to all systems
